column5: Someone gave me portable hut for ice fishing couple years ago. Never used it once as I walk ( don't own a snow machine). This thing is heavy to pull by myself. Anyhow, don't mind giving it to someone who can use it... for free.You'll need to pick it up.Feel free to PM with questions.  Cheers, Ice Fisherman
That is a very kind offer, I am sure someone on here will make good use of it!
Where are you? Id be very interested!

If it's bigger than my portable I'll trade you and you can either give someone else my Clam 2000 for free or keep it.  I'm in Lindsay if that works for you.  If yours is heavier than a Clam 2000 but the Clam works for you then maybe a swap so you still have a hut for when you can use it?
Hut was just picked up by another board member. Thanks to all who PM-ed me. Cheers, Ice Fisherman
Good karma is heading your way now Emil   May the Whitie and Laker gods smile on you this winter
